name: HOLLOW HAZE "Countdown To Revenge" Digi CD
description:
•	Fifth album for the talented Melodic Metal band!
•	‘Countdown To Revenge’ is Hollow Haze’s first album featuring new singer FABIO LIONE (Rhapsody Of Fire, Kamelot)
•	Mixed by SASCHA PAETH (Avantasia, Edguy, Angra, Rhapsody Of Fire) at Gate Studios in Wolfsburg, Germany
•	The album also features collaborations with Antarktica and Wintermoon Orchestra, making it grandiose and epic as never before
•	RICK ALTZI (Masterplan, Thunderstone, At Vance) appears as a very special guest on the song ‘Still Alive’  
•	A videoclip is in the works and will be announced very soon
•	Heavy touring will follow the album release. Hollow Haze have previously toured with Tarja, Dragonforce and Accept among others.    

 


Tracklist:
1. Room 212 (Intro)
2. Watching In Silence
3. Still Alive
4. No Rest For The Angels
5. Life Has No Meaning
6. We Must Believe
7. The Answer
8. Il Tempo Del Fuoco
9. A Fading Angel’s Life
10. Countdown To Revenge
11. The Gate To Nowhere…

name: DARK MOOR - Ars Musica - CD +2 Bonus Tracks
description:
•	Ninth album for the Symphonic Power Metal masters!
•	A monumental Power/Symphonic album made of beautiful melodies, elaborate arrangements and top notch musicianship
•	Featuring talented singer Alfred Romero’s most inspired and powerful performance to date
•	Produced by Luigi Stefanini (Rhapsody Of Fire, Labyrinth, Vision Divine)     
•	Limited edition CD-Slipcase featuring 2 bonus tracks
•	The stunning artwork was handled by Brazilian dark artist Nathália Suellen 

Tracklist:
1.Ars Musica
2.The First Lance Of Spain
3.This Is My Way
4.The Road Again
5.Together As Ever
6.The City Of Peace
7.Gara & Jonay
8.Living In A Nightmare
9.El Último Rey
10.Saint James Way
11.Asturias
12.The Road Again (Acoustic Version – bonus)
13. Living In A Nightmare (Orchestral Version – bonus)

name: ANGELS OF BABYLON - Thundergod - Digi CD
description:
•	The long-waited new album of the new Classic/Power metal sensation!
•	An epic masterpiece in the vein of classic albums such as those of Black Sabbath, Rainbow, Dio and Queen 
•	Featuring former MANOWAR drummer Kenny “Rhino” Earl
•	The band featured MEGADETH bassist David Ellefson on their first, critically acclaimed release 
•	Limited Edition Digi CD
•	Heavy touring will follow the album release.   
•	Ads, reviews and interviews have already being planned and will appear in all the relevant Heavy Metal media worldwide

Tracklist:
1. Thunder God
2. Sondrio
3. Queen Warrior
4. What Have You Become
5. White Star Line
6. The Enemy
7. True Brothers
8. Redemption
9. King Of All Kings
10. Turning To Stone
11. Bullet

name: INFINITA SYMPHONIA - Infinita Symphonia - CD
description:
- New album for the critically acclaimed band!
- A stunning mix of Classic/Power Metal, Progressive and Hard Rock 
- Featuring legendary singer Michael Kiske (Helloween/Unisonic) on the song ‘Fly’
- Recorded and mixed by Giuseppe Orlando (Novembre) at Outer Sound Studio
- Mastered by Henkka Niemistö and Svante Forsbäck at Chartmakers Studio (Sonata Arctica, Apocalyptica)   

Tracklist:

2.The Last Breath
3.Welcome To My World
4.Drowsiness
5.In Your Eyes
6.Fly
7.Interlude
8.Waiting For A Day Of Happiness
9.X IV
10.Limbo

name: EXTREMA "The Seed Of Foolishness" CD
description:
Sixth album for the much celebrated Thrash Metal machine! 
     •	10 powerful new tracks mixing sharp guitar riffs, groovy rhythms and abrasive vocals
•	Extrema debuted in 1993 with the much celebrated ‘We Fuckin’ Care’ EP and, since then, they released 6 studio albums, a live albums and a gigantic double DVD celebrating  their twentieth anniversary    
•	Having shared the stage with some of the biggest names in Metal (Metallica, Korn and Death Angel among others), Extrema are ready to perform the new material live on stage Starting from May 4th, 2013
•	Ads, reviews and interviews on the major Metal publications have already been planned
•	A video for the first single ‘Pyre Of Fire’ is in the making and will be released soon
    

Tracklist:

1. Between The Lines 
2. The Politics 
3. Pyre Of Fire 
4. The Distance 
5. Ending Prophecies
6. Bones 
7. Again And Again 
8. Deep Infection 
9. Sick And Tired 
10. A Moment Of Truth

name: EMPYRIOS "Zion" CD
description:
•	Third album for the critically acclaimed Progressive Metal band! 
•	Featuring guitar virtuoso and acclaimed producer SIMONE MULARONI (DGM), guitarist SIMONE BERTOZZI (MNEMIC) and drummer DARIO CICCIONI (HARTMANN) 
•	An outstanding mix of sounds in the vein of STRAPPING YOUNG LAD, NEVERMORE, SYMPHONY X, FEAR FACTORY, YNGWIE MALMSTEEN and MESHUGGAH among others
•	Recorded, mixed and mastered by Simone Mularoni at Domination Studios in San Marino, Italy 
•	Cryptic cover artwork by the band’s own singer Silvio Mancini
•	Live dates to be announced soon on the band’s official web pages
    

Tracklist:
1.Nescience
2.Domino
3.Masters
4.Reverie
5.Unplugged
6.Renovation
7.Wormhole
8.Square One
9.Zion
10.Blackmail
11.Madman

name: DGM "Momentum" DigiCD
description:
•	Eight album for the leading European progressive Metal band!
•	A monumental concept made of beautiful melodies, classy arrangements and top notch musicianship
•	Featuring a very special guest appearance by legendary singer RUSSELL ALLEN (SYMPHONY X, ADRENALINE MOB) and guitar virtuoso JORN VIGGO LOFSTAD (PAGAN’S MIND)
•	Recorded, mixed and mastered by Simone Mularoni at Domination Studios in San Marino, Italy     
•	Cover Artwork by SIMONE BERTOZZI (MNEMIC)
•	Two videoclips are in the works and will be announced very soon
•	Heavy touring will follow the album release. A prestigious appearance at Power Prog & Metal Fest 2013 in Mons, Belgium (w/Avantasia, Stratovarius and more) has already been confirmed.   

 


Tracklist:

4.Numb
5.Pages
6.Repay
7.Chaos (feat. Jorn Viggo Lofstad)
8.Remembrance

10.Void
11.Blame

name: ShiHuangDi - Digi CD
description:
•	The long-waited return of the veteran power metallers
•	Following 2009’s acclaimed album ‘Dawn’
•	Another epic conceptual record, in the vein of Thy Majesties’s acclaimed albums ‘The Lasting Power’ (2000) and ‘Hastings 1066’ (2002)!    
•	Mixed by Giuseppe Orlando (Novembre) at Outer Sound Studios in Rome, Italy
•	Mastered by Mika Jussila (Nightwish, Sonata Arctica, Stratovarius) at Finnvox Studios in Helsinki, Finland
•	Featuring a very special guest appearance by renowned singer Fabio Lione (Rhapsody of Fire, Vision Divine, Kamelot) on the song ‘End Of The Days’

 


Tracklist:

name: The Return To Psycho, California -  Digi CD
description:
•	The stunning debut of Hollywood celebrated rockers!
•	Featuring the combined talents of Rick Stitch (Adler’s Appetite), Alex Grossi (Quiet Riot), Mike Duda (W.A.S.P.) and Mike Dupke (W.A.S.P.)
•	Produced by Gilby Clarke (Guns N’ Roses, Rockstar Supernova), with additional production by Matt Starr (Ace Frehley, Beautiful Creatures)
•	Featuring an addictive cover version of Oasis classic ‘Wonderwall’
•	Legendary Los Angeles rock station 95.5 KLOS exclusively debuted 'Bury You', the first track released off of the album, to an overwhelming response in June of 2012
•	Hotel Diablo has been confirmed for the 2012 Sunset Strip Music Festival. The band will be performing at the legendary Whisky A Go Go on Saturday, August 18

 


Tracklist:
1.  Taken
2.  All These Years
3.  What You Do To Me
4.  Psycho California
5.  Bury You
6.  Set It Off
7.  Wicked Lines
8.  Wonderwall
9.  Trigger
10. What You Do To Me (ALTERNATE VERSION)
11. Bury You (ALTERNATE VERSION)

name: Warface CD
description:
•	The long waited debut album of former Venom drummer Antton Lant
•	Following the critically acclaimed self titled EP
•	The band displays a wide range of influences, from modern metal to old school rock and punk music
•	Bloodstock Festival organizers described Def-Con-One as coming across like a bar fight between Machine Head, Slayer and Pantera 
•	Def-Con-One have already toured relentlessly across the UK and are now ready to spread their verb across Europe and the rest of the world

name: The Ignitor CD
description:
•	After successful albums on prestigious German powerhouses such as Limb Music and Metal Heaven, Finnish Metal masters Burning Point are going to release their 5th album on Scarlet Records
•	‘The Ignitor’ sets new standards for the band, combining all the best elements of its predecessors and throwing them into Heavy Metal and Hard Rock Heaven!
•	Mastered at Tico Tico Studios (Sonata Arctica, Sentenced) by Ahti Kortelainen  
•	Featuring stunning cover artwork by Felipe Machado Franco (Blind Guardian, Rhapsody Of Fire, Iron Savior)

name: Hell To The Holy - DigiCD
description:
•	The return of Venom legends Mantas, Antton and Demolition Man!
•	The band’s long-waited debut album… a real must for every Venom fan and not only!
•	Featuring 10 brand-new songs combining Mantas’ thunderous riffs, a huge rhythm section and Dolan’s abrasive vocals  
•	Featuring stunning cover artwork by Gyula Havancsák (Annihilator, Destruction, Grave Digger) 
•	Available in a luxury digipack edition including band poster
•	Mpire Of Evil will embark on a full scale tour in 2012. North American dates with British Thrash Metal legends Onslaught have already been confirmed

name: Gaia's Legacy CD
description:
•	The long-waited new album from progressive metal veterans ELDRITCH.
•	A stunning concept album on global warming based on Al Gore’s documentary ‘An Inconvenient Truth’
•	The band goes back to their technical progressive roots, with lots of influences raging from thrash to aor and a modern approach still in the band’s distinctive style
•	Featuring Bob Katsionis (Firewind) on the song ‘Like A Child’  
•	Mastered by Göran Finnberg (Opeth, In Flames, Evergrey, Dark Tranquillity)
•	Reviews, interviews and special features to appear in the major worldwide press
•	European tour to be announced soon!













TRACKLIST:

1.	Gaia’s Anger
2.	Deviation
3.	Our Land
4.	Vortex Of Disasters
5.	Mother Earth
6.	Everything’s Burning
7.	Thinning Out
8.	Like A Child
9.	Signs
10.	Thoughts Of Grey
11.	Thirst In Our Hands (Gaia’s Lament)
12.	Through Different Eyes

name: Idiosincrasy
description:
•	The new album for one of Europe’s most legendary extreme metal acts
•	Featuring 1 astonishing, 40-minute long track which sums Necrodeath’s signature musical approach 
•	Mixed by Giuseppe Orlando (Novembre) at Outer Sound Studios in Rome, Italy
•	Featuring guest appearance by Leif Jensen (Dew-Scented) on vocals 
•	Artwork by Nerve Design (Nile, Vision Divine, Threshold, Bulldozer)

name: Heart Of The City - DigiCD
description:
•	Royal Hunt’s first “Best Of” album, celebrating the band’s 20th anniversary
•	Including songs from the first 5 legendary and now hard to find albums
•	Featuring stellar performances from legendary singer DC Cooper
•	Coming in a limited digipack edition featuring exclusive artwork
•	Royal Hunt will be touring the world starting from April 2012, including several dates in Europe
•	A real “must” for fans of powerful, melodic and technically challenging Heavy Metal
